About

Joseph Hyatt

🖖 My name is Joseph Hyatt and I'm a freelance web developer/programmer. I'm not an expert in any language but currently use Ruby/Rails, JavaScript, Nodejs, Sass, and C++. The experience I built across such a variety of languages, frameworks, and platforms means that I’ve finally gotten over “fear of the unknown”. What actually matters is that I can figure things out with documentation, patience, and the invaluable knowledge base of a proper google search.

✊ I love making and sharing things I have built with the world.

📋 Currently developing a Discussion Board Application. It's open source and a great way to communicate with a remote team.

✍ I love writing. You can read all the articles I wrote on Medium, or take a look through my personal Wiki where I share everything I know.

🧠 I share my thoughts on Twitter, I share my code on GitHub, and you can see photos I took on Instagram.

🎥 I also am starting to make educational YouTube videos, and share my music playlists.

💻 I am passionate about programming and discuss it all in my Discord Channel.

🦹‍♂️ Programming languages I use and feel comfortable with include Ruby/Rails, JavaScript Channel, Node.js, and C++.

👨‍💻 I'm always on the lookout for new career opportunities, feel free to view my Résumé.

🍀 If you want to know more about me, you can explore my Wiki, or even contribute to it.

🙋‍♂️ Nothing makes me happier than to help others. If you have questions aboutComputer Science, Web Development/Programming, or Math feel free to Email Me, WhatsApp Me, or join my Discord Channel.

☕ I love meeting new people. Currently, I reside in Southern California if you want to grab a coffee and talk.
